name: protractor-style-guide
description: Guia de estilo de automação com Protractor
author: Paulo Gonçalves <paulorochag@hotmail.com> (https://linkedin.com/in/paulo-goncalves)

scripts.test:chrome: webdriver-manager update --standalone false --gecko false && protractor e2e/configs/protractorChrome.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: webdriver-manager update --standalone false --chrome false && protractor e2e/configs/protractorFirefox.conf.js
scripts.test: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:firefox
